title: Discover a Food & Wine Paradise in King Valley
description: Set off on a gourmet escape in one of Victoria’s premier food and wine regions - only a 2.5-hour drive from Melbourne. Stay two nights at Lindenwarrah at Milawa and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a bottle of Lancemore Group Estate Wine, guaranteed midday checkout, cheese tasting, 20% off wine at Brown Brothers cellar door (located across the road) and more for two.

title: Wine, Dine & Relax with a Tranquil Getaway to Victoria's High Country
description: Set off on a gourmet escape in one of Victoria’s premier food and wine regions, only a 2.5-hour drive from Melbourne. Experience the best of the King Valley and unwind at Lindenwarrah at Milawa, located close to world-class epicurean hot spots such as the award-winning Milawa Cheese Factory and Brown Brothers Winery. Your package includes daily hot buffet country breakfast, guaranteed late checkout at midday and savings on a host of local experiences.

title: Romantic Break in Victoria's King Valley
description: Discover Victoria’s beautiful wine country with a romantic escape just 2.5 hours' drive from Melbourne. Escape to the King Valley at the Lancemore Milawa, located close to world-class epicurean hot spots such as the award-winning Milawa Cheese Factory and Brown Brothers Winery. Your package includes a daily country-style breakfast and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout.

title: Grand Reopening: Romantic King Valley Wine-Lovers' Escape with Local Tastings & Dining Credit
description:
Discover Victoria’s beautiful High Country with a romantic escape to the picturesque Lancemore Milawa in the King Valley gourmet food and wine region. Fresh from a multi-million dollar renovation headed by renowned interior designer Hana Hakim in September 2022, this stunning boutique hotel draws inspiration from the surrounding natural splendour to stimulate your senses and enhance your stay. Overlooking rolling vineyards and manicured gardens, each elegant guestroom is designed to bring the beauty of the outside in.

Ideally located only 2.5 hours' drive from Melbourne, the hotel is perfectly placed for an indulgent escape, with world-class epicurean hot spots on its doorstep. Spend an afternoon at the award-winning Milawa Cheese Company, or cruise the King Valley Prosecco Road, a haven of picturesque vineyards like the iconic Brown Brothers winery. The quaint towns of Bright and Beechworth are easy day trips through lush countryside, while first-class onsite facilities include a gourmet restaurant, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, and a cosy wood fireplace to ensure a romantic year-round escape.

title: Boutique King Valley Vineyard Escape with Daily Breakfast, A$50 Dining Credit & Cellar Door Tastings
description:
Discover Victoria’s beautiful High Country with a romantic escape among the vineyards of the King Valley gourmet food and wine region. Fresh from a multi-million dollar renovation headed by renowned interior designer Hana Hakim in late 2022, this stunning boutique hotel draws inspiration from the surrounding natural splendour to stimulate your senses and enhance your stay. 

Ideally located three hours' drive from Melbourne, the hotel is perfectly placed for an indulgent escape, with world-class epicurean hot spots on its doorstep. Spend an afternoon at the award-winning Milawa Cheese Company, cruise the famous King Valley Prosecco Road, or pop into local breweries to sample intriguing brews. 

Overlooking rolling vineyards and manicured gardens, each elegant room is designed to bring the beauty of the outside in. The quaint towns of Bright and Beechworth are easy day trips through lush countryside, while first-class facilities include a gourmet restaurant, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, plus a cosy wood fireplace for a romantic year-round escape.

description:
Discover Victoria’s beautiful High Country with a romantic escape to the picturesque Lancemore Milawa, nestled amongst vineyards in the King Valley gourmet food and wine region. Fresh from a multi-million dollar renovation headed by renowned interior designer Hana Hakim in late 2022, this stunning boutique hotel draws inspiration from the surrounding natural splendour to stimulate your senses and enhance your stay. Ideally located three hours' drive from Melbourne, the hotel is perfectly placed for an indulgent escape, with world-class epicurean hot spots on its doorstep. title: Boutique King Valley Vineyard Escape with Daily Breakfast, A$50 Dining Credit & Cellar Door Tastings
description:
Discover Victoria’s beautiful High Country with a romantic escape among the vineyards of the King Valley gourmet food and wine region. Ideally located three hours' drive from Melbourne, this elegant hotel is perfectly placed for an indulgent getaway, with world-class epicurean hot spots on its doorstep.

Overlooking picture-perfect gardens, each elegant room is designed to bring the beauty of the outside in. First-class facilities include a sauna and outdoor swimming pool, plus a cosy wood fireplace for a romantic year-round retreat. The onsite Merlot Restaurant Bar boasts floor-to-ceiling windows and celebrates the region’s finest artisanal producers.

When it's time to venture out, spend an afternoon at the award-winning Milawa Cheese Company, cruise the famous King Valley Prosecco Road or pop into local breweries to sample intriguing craft brews. The quaint High Country towns of Bright and Beechworth also make for easy day trips through lush countryside.

title: Romantic King Valley Wine-Lovers' Escape with Daily À La Carte Breakfast
description:
Discover Victoria’s beautiful High Country with a romantic escape to the picturesque Lancemore Milawa in the heart of King Valley's gourmet wine region.

Ideally located only 2.5 hours' drive from Melbourne, the hotel is perfectly placed for exploring world-class epicurean hot spots such as the award-winning Milawa Cheese Company and the King Valley Prosecco Road, a haven of picturesque vineyards home to the iconic Brown Brothers winery, or the quaint towns of Bright and Beechworth. Nestled amid lush countryside, overlooking rolling vineyards and manicured gardens, each elegant guestroom is designed to bring the beauty of the outside in. First-class onsite facilities include a gourmet restaurant, sauna and outdoor swimming pool, and a cosy wood fireplace to ensure a romantic year-round escape.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Wake up with daily à la carte country-style breakfast and vineyard views at Restaurant Merlot
- Relax until the very last moment with 12pm late checkout
- Relive your escape with a bottle of Lindenderry wine gifted to you on departure

**Sunrise & Sunset Upgrades with bonus dinner**: Upgrade to a room with sunrise or sunset views and you'll also enjoy a three-course dinner for two at Restaurant Merlot.

title: Romantic Lancemore Wine-Lovers' Escape in the Heart of the King Valley
description: Known as a foodie’s heaven and a wine connoisseur’s delight, the picturesque Lancemore Milawa offers visitors a breath of fresh country air in the gourmet King Valley region of Victoria’s beautiful High Country. Nestled amid lush countryside and rolling vineyards, the hotel provides the perfect opportunity to indulge, relax and explore the stunning scenery and local culinary scene. Ideally located only 2.5 hours' drive from Melbourne, the hotel is perfectly placed for exploring world-class epicurean hot spots such as the award-winning Milawa Cheese Company and the King Valley Prosecco Road, a haven of picturesque vineyards home to the iconic Brown Brothers winery. First-class onsite facilities include a gourmet restaurant, outdoor swimming pool and a cosy wood fireplace to ensure a romantic escape year-round.
